players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. He killed Diana. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice is mafia. Vote Alice."
You: "I agree with Charlie. Bob is mafia. Alice is innocent."
Charlie: " ... "
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Charlie, I think you misinterpreted. Maybe Alice was the real killer. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. He killed Diana. Vote Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice is mafia. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I agree with Charlie. Bob is mafia. Alice is innocent."
Charlie: " ... "
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Charlie, I think you misinterpreted. Maybe Alice was the real killer. Vote Alice."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. He killed Diana. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Diana. Alice is mafia. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I agree with Charlie. Bob is mafia. Alice is innocent."
Alice: remained silent.
Bob: "Charlie, I think you misinterpreted. Maybe Alice was the real killer. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
